name: A Game of Changes
description: A 3d puzzle platformer that takes you along a journey of wisdom, through the 64 unique worlds that draw inspiration and teachings from the I Ching [Book of Changes], one of the oldest oracles in human history.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 or better Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2Ghz Dual-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card Storage: 80 MB available space

reviews.review_text: WOWW!!!Amazing game 10/10-graphics 10/10-compatibility it work on a 10 years old notebook :D(very good optimisation) 10/10-storage,only 80mb,now a android game require more,but this game with so many levels,so good graphics requires so little,JUST AMAZING! +i buy this game on 15% sale and it worth all the money,so i really recommend it!
